titlestmt.titleproper: Register of the Petr Berngardovich Struve papers, 1890-1987
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Ronald M. Bulatoff and Olga Dunlop, revised by Lyalya Kharitonova

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2016-08-30T09:18-0700

change.item: Revised to add incremental materials by Lyalya Kharitonova.
Revised to send to SAL3, change access to material to microfilm use only.
Revised to update encoding by Samira Bozorgi.
PUBLIC "-//Stanford University::Hoover Institution Archives//TEXT (US::CSt-H::::Petr Berngardovich Struve Papers)//EN" "reg_112.sgm" converted from EAD 1.0 to 2002 by v1to02.cdl.xsl (2004-09-16).

did.abstract: Correspondence, speeches and writings, reports, memoranda, essays, editorial files, printed matter, photographs, and memorabilia relating to Russia in World War I, the Russian Revolution and Civil War, anti-Bolshevik movements, the Russian economy and industry, conditions in the Soviet Union after the Revolution, and Russian literary and political émigré affairs. Includes papers of the wife and sons of Petr Struve.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: Boxes 1-45 closed. Microfilm use copies available.

The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Petr Berngardovich Struve papers, [Box no.], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Materials were acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 1979, with increments received in 1980, 1982, 1983, and 1985.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the online catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

eventgrp.event: Graduated from the University of St. Petersburg
Published Critical Observations on the Problem of Russia's Economic Development

chronitem.event: Returned to Russia and joined the Constitutional-Democratic (Cadet) Party
Member, Government Commission on Food Supply

eventgrp.event: Elected to the Russian Academy of Sciences
Joined the Russian Provisional Government and resigned shortly afterward

chronitem.event: Minister of Foreign Affairs, Volunteer (White) Army under General Vrangel'

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: Correspondence, speeches and writings, reports, memoranda, essays, editorial files, printed matter, photographs, and memorabilia relating to Russia in World War I, the Russian Revolution and Civil War, anti-Bolshevik movements, the Russian economy and industry, conditions in the Soviet Union after the Revolution, and Russian literary and political émigré affairs. Includes papers of the wife and sons of Petr Struve.
Incremental materials received subsequent to the creation of this register are listed at the end of the register.

did.unittitle: Microfilm Reel Content Guide for Boxes 1-45

item.extref: Downloadable PDF file of the Microfilm Reel Content Guide

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Biographical material, including personal documents, calling cards, address books, reviews and other material related to biographies and biographical articles about Petr Struve, and clippings about Petr Struve from periodical press.

did.unittitle: Genealogy of the Struve family, printed copy,
Obituaries and letters of condolence on P. B. Struve's death,
Short biographies and chronologies of P.B. Struve's life, typescript,
Reviews of biographies of P. B. Struve
Frank, Simon, Biografiia P. B. Struve
Koriakin, Iu. F., excerpt from untitled article, typescript,
Mikhailov, S. E., "Pokhorony russkogo liberalizma. O knige S. L. Franka Biografiia P. B. Struve," typescript copy of article published in Voprosy filosofii,
Pipes, Richard, Struve, Liberal on the Left and Struve, Liberal on the Right
Struve, Gleb, comments and questions, typescript,
Biographical articles re P. B. Struve

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes miscellaneous articles re P. B. Struve and responses from Gleb Struve, printed and typescript copies.

Indexes of writings and correspondence in P. B. Struve's archive, typescript

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Notes, drafts, typescript and printed copies of books, articles, lectures, and book reviews by Petr Struve, arranged chronologically. Includes clippings of his newspaper articles.

"Ni sotsializm, ni restavratsiia, a osvobozhdenie i vozrozhdenie,"
"Ob"edinenie deistvennykh sil, kak fakt i kak zadanie,"
"O krasnoi armii, ob 'interventsii' i drugikh veshchakh,"
"D.S. Pasmanik ob edinom fronte.-- Imperiia i tsarstvo L. Petrova,"
"Gosudarstvennoe darovanie i politicheskii lik P.N. Vrangelia,"
"Istoricheskoe prozrenie Ivana Aksakova o Serbii i serbakh,"

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note

did.unittitle: "B.N. Chicherin i ego mesto v istorii russkoi obrazovannosti i obshchestvennosti,"
"Aleksandr II v otsenkakh i kharakteristikakh dvukh russkikh liudei,"
"Pritiagatel'naia sila i vnutrenniaia moshch russkoi kul'tury,"
"Serbskiia narodnyia pesni v perevode A.Kh. Vostokova,"
"Dal'nevostochnaia bor'ba s tochki zreniia russkikh interesov,"
"Tri russkikh zhenshchiny. Pamiati I.F. Dubasovoi, E.K. Chelnokovoi i E.A. Rodichevoi,"
"Vstupitel'noe slovo k besede o T.N. 'porevoliutsionykh techeniiakh',"
"Bernard Shou, rasklanivaiushchiisia s palachami, ulybaiushchiisia sovetskoi mishure i ne vidiashchii sovetskoi nishchety.--Podlinnaia o nei pravda,"
"Poleznaia istoricheskaia spravka po povodu strannoi i nenuzhnoi polemiki,"
"Nashy utraty i nashy zadachi.--Ko dnu s rastushchim uskoreniem,"
"Neskol'ko slov o 'Nashem znameni'.--O deistvennom ob"edinenii i k chemu ono obiazyvaet?,"
"Eshche temno i smutno, no brezzhit svet.--Neobkhodimo byt' gotovym,"
"Pamiati K.I. Velichko. N. K. f.-Mekka i N.A. Pal'chinskago, v unizhenii umuchennykh,"
"Russkiia nastroeniia.--Kak my dolzhny k nim otnosit'sia?,"
"Dva kornia i dva ustoia bol'shevizma.--I oba oni shataiutsia,"
"Ideologiia, razrushaiushchaia byt i sama prevrashchaiushchaiasia v zverinyi byt,"
"Polozhenie v Rossii i zadachi russkago zarubezh'ia,"
"Zhizneubiistvo, kak politicheskaia sistema, i aktivnaia bor'ba s neiu,"
"Dve prakticheskie idei nachinaiut zavoevyvat' zarubezh'e.--Vseob"emliushchii smysl idei svobody,"
"Oni do sikh por nichego ne ponimaiut,"
"Neskol'ko tsennykh priznanii A.F. Kerenskago i ego korrespondentov,"
"Dva polozheniia: nevozmozhnost' evoliutsii bol'shevizma i bol'shevikov; nevozmozhnost' 'restovratsii' starogo...,"
"Zadachi segodniashniago dnia i obrashcheniia k proshlomu,"
"Znachenie levago kryla zarubezh'ia, kak izmeritel'nago pribora i kanala soobshcheniia,"
"Chego ne vidiat, ne slyshat i ne ponimaiut inostrantsy, turisty i snoby,"
"Mechta izmuchennoi Rossii ob interventsii i chto iz etogo 'konstatirovaniia' vytekaet,"
"Nekotoryia inostrannyia suzhdeniia i soobshcheniia o sovetskoi ekonomike, kotoryia polezno 'zaregistrirovat'',"
"Velikiia problemy i protivorech'ia, razmenivaemyia na glupyia melochi i poshlyia intrigi.--Pagubnaia putanitsa, iz sego moguchaia proistech',"
"Sovetskie zakazy i ekonomicheskoe polozhenie Germanii.--Real'nost' kommunisticheskoi opasnosti dlia vsego mira,"
"O pessimizme.--Franko-Sovetskii flirt.--Pochemu on menia ne pugaet?--Peredovaia Frankfurter Zeitung. --Osnovnaia psikhologicheskaia maksima natsional'no-osvoboditel'noi bor'by,"
"Iumoristicheskaia khodynka ili rebiach'ia vavilonskaia bashnia intelligenstkikh razubezhdenii,"
"Nevezhestvo ili nedobrosovestnost'.--'Antikapitalisti- cheskiia' ideologiia ideologiia i nastroeniia',"
"Angliiskii politicheskii krizis.--Rol' i figura Makdonal'da.--Krizis germanskii--rol' i figura kantsler Briuninga.--Neskol'ko slov ob ispanskikh delakh,"
"Fantom politicheskoi reaktsii i real'nost' sotsial'noi revoliutsii.--Liubitel'skiia rechi o kontse kapitalizma,"
"Pechal'nyia vesti iz Bolgarii i o Bolgarii,"
"Priroda sovetskago rezhima, raskryvaiushchaiasia na sud'be sovetskago uchenago sanovnika, Gol'dendakha-Riazanova,"
"Sovremennyi mir i polozhenie i rol' v nem kommunizma,"
"Khitlerovshchina, kak podgotovka kommunizma. Kommunizm v Kitae i desovetizatsiia Manzhurii,"
"Vybory v Germanii i vybory vo Frantsii,"
"Bol'shevitskoe zapugivanie mnimoi 'burzhuaznoi interventsiei' i ikh sobstvennoe real'noe i khronocheskoe vmeshatel'stvo v dela 'burzhuaznago' mira,"
"Bol'shevizmi zapadnoe obshchestvennoe mnenie.--Nabliudeniia Iusta i vpechatleniia Iasperta,"
"Prevrashchenie 'malogo soglasiia' v krepkii soiuz--neskol'ko mysleii o 'Lige Natsii',"
"Iapono-Kitaiskii konflikt i polozhenie na dal'nem vostoke--analiz ego faktorov,"
"Politicheskii sdvig v Germanii i ego znachenie,"
"Natsional'naia revoliutsiia v Gremanii. --'Politichnoe' zaiavlenie Adol'fa Gitlera budet oprovergnuto istorieii,"
"V sovetskoi Rossii polozhenie kommunisticheskoi vlasti otchaianoe i revoliutsiia ob"ektivno sozrela,"
"Bol'shevizatsiia Germanii, eia kharakter i razmery.--Mozhet li ona dolgo tianutsia i chem ona mozhet obernutsia?,"
"Iskhod germanskikh i prusskikh vyborov i tragediia sotsialdemokratii," printed copy,
"Dvadtsat' sem' tezisov o sovremennom mezhdunarodnom polozhenii,"
"Vosem polozhenii, predlozhennykh na sobranii v Belgrade, i neskol'ko dopolnite'nykh k nim raz"iasnenii,"
"Posledniaia kniga Osval'da Shpenglera, buria protiv nego i rokovoi postavlennyi im vopros,"
"Slovesnyie idoly, a v sushchestve chto zhe?,"
"Vpechatleniia i mysli po povodu dokladov T.V. Chernavinoi ...,"
"25-letie Politekhnicheskago Instituta imeni Imperatora Petra Velikago,"
"Pamiati Maksimiliana A. Voloshina. Stranichka iz vospominanii,"

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Material related to Petr Struve's work with Vozrozhdenie, Rossiia and Rossiia i Slavianstvo. Includes holograph and typescript copies of articles submitted for publication and business and personal correspondence of editorial office.

did.unittitle: Printed matter and letters about him,

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Correspondence and writings of Lev Struve, son of Petr Struve, arranged by physical form.

did.unittitle: "Oleg Brand," unpublished novel in three parts,
Struve, Gleb, introduction to proposed publication, typescript,
Obituaries and letters of condolence at his death,

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Personal documents, correspondence, and writings of Nina Struve, wife of Petr Struve, arranged by physical form.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes obituary of her brother, Aleksandr Gerd.

did.unittitle: Letters of condolence on the death of Nina Struve,
Zhyrmunskaia, T. N. and Iakovleva, O. A. (her mother),
Aleksei Struve family, including wife and children,
"Peasant Life In Soviet Russia," London Times (?), printed copy,
Reminiscences re Revolution of 1917, holograph and handwritten copy,
Includes portrait prints of Petr Struve and drawings of Petr Struve and Simon Frank, as well as prints of Russian Civil War in the Far East (Chita, Irkutsk and Vladivostok)
Order of St. Savva (Serbia) belonging to Petr Struve

arrangement.head: Arrangement Statement
arrangement.p: Arranged in two groups, then alphabetically thereunder by name of correspondent.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes records, correspondence, newsletters, and other material relating to Petr Struve's career as a Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Russian Provisional Government.

did.unittitle: Ministry dossiers of special files compiled for Petr Struve,

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Include political reports and analyses, correspondence, and notes, organized by general topic as originally received.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes typed draft of article, manuscript notes, and draft notes for untitled speeches on Russian histrory.

did.unittitle: "The Bolshevik Terror; Russian Professor's Escape," Petr Struve interview to Reuters, London,
"Politicheskaia Svodka, Otdel Propagandy Osobogo Soveshchaniia pri Glavnokomanduuishchem Vooruzhennymi Silami Iuga Rossii," Nos. 12-148, Ekaterinodar,

arrangement.head: Arrangement Statement
arrangement.p: The files are in their original order using original folder headings.
